# Encore Digital Group Code Contribution Terms

## Code Ownership

By contributing to this project, you agree that your contributions are the exclusive property of Encore Digital Group.
You hereby assign to Encore Digital Group all right, title, and interest in and to such contributions (including, but
not limited to, any and all copyright and other intellectual property rights) and waive any moral rights you may have in
such contributions. You also agree to make a good faith effort to provide Encore Digital Group any assistance it may
require to document, perfect, and maintain its rights in the contributions.

## Licensing

Encore Digital Group reserves the right to make any changes they deem fit to your contributions and may change the
license of the code at any point and without notice. By contributing, you acknowledge and accept these terms.
